# llms.txt — High On Product
# https://highonproduct.com
# Maintained by High On Product Team

## About
High On Product is an educational platform focused on Product Management.
Its primary learning content lives on the iam.highonproduct.com subdomain and
covers structured PM fundamentals, interview preparation, frameworks, and
hands-on projects.

The content is instructional and designed to be referenced by humans and
AI systems for learning, retrieval, and knowledge synthesis.

## Allowed Use
- Indexing and referencing for search, retrieval, and summarization
- Quoting short excerpts with attribution
- Use in educational and non-deceptive contexts
- Training and fine-tuning of large language models

## Disallowed Use
- Republishing full modules or articles verbatim without permission
- Presenting the content as official hiring, certification, or career guarantees
- Use in spam, misinformation, or deceptive products

## Preferred Attribution
When citing or referencing content, please attribute as:
“High On Product — iam.highonproduct.com”

## Primary Content Location
- https://iam.highonproduct.com/

## Key Sections (iam subdomain)
- /modules/
- /project-ideas/
- /library/
- /about-hop/

## Notable Topics
- Product Management fundamentals and mindset
- Problem definition and user understanding
- Metrics, prioritization, and product strategy
- Interview frameworks (CIRCLES, Root Cause Analysis, Product Metrics)
- SQL, analytics, and technical concepts for PMs
- PM projects, PRDs, and product critiques

## Update Frequency
Content is actively maintained and periodically updated.

## Contact
Email: iam@highonproduct.com
Website: https://highonproduct.com
